column4: yo.  I got 2 usb bluetooth dongles on two laptops, work great, except, they have identical MAC addresses. Anyone know how I might change one?
you can try changing the MAC with ifconfig; something like sudo ifconfig <iface> hw ether xx:xx:xx:xx:xx
I think there's also a way to change the MAC on startup by editing /etc/network/interfaces, although I don't know if you can still manage the connection with network manager afterwards
whoops, somehow I missed the "bluetooth" part of your question
